page.title: 01REVIEW: N.BRISTOL
page.content: North Bristol block includes large {council estate}of Southmead,{affluent {suburbs}- Westbury-on-Trym,Brentry, & part of Henbury,Horfield,& Filton.A gulf exists between the areas in terms of sports facilities, employment, {housing.}The block contains Southmead Hospital,Brentry Mental{Hospital}& Lanercost Day Centre for the mentally handicapped & Canford Cemetery. Dept of Environment occupies Govt offices. Old Bristol boundary & railway line cross N.& E. squares-farm land & Filton{Aircraft}works beyond come into the block.2 golf courses, school playing fields & Henleaze Bathing Lake skirt the area. Horfield{Sports Centre {opens soon-}though closure of Greenway Sec. School may lead to loss of sports facilities in Southmead, worsening feelings of deprivation.Planned {festival}may improve area spirit.
